description: The video starts with the Google Pixel logo and the words "Google Pixel 8" in white text overlaid a scene of people walking near a building. A person wearing a colorful sweater and a purple beanie with bear ears is taking a selfie with a Pixel 8 phone.
keywords: Google Pixel 8, advertisement, selfie, colorful sweater, purple beanie

description: A man in a purple hat and colorful sweater takes a selfie against a stone structure with the Google Pixel 8. The letters "AI" in gradient colors appear, emphasizing the phone's artificial intelligence capabilities.
keywords: Google Pixel 8, advertisement, artificial intelligence, selfie, purple hat

text: Features simulated and sequences shortened throughout ad.
description: The man in the purple beanie and colorful cardigan dances in the street captured by the Pixel 8's camera, with the text "to make" appearing on screen, hinting at the editing capabilities.
keywords: Google Pixel 8, advertisement, dancing, street, editing capabilities

text: Features simulated and sequences shortened throughout ad.
description: The man previously seen dancing on the street is now standing, showcasing the Google Pixel logo and a message indicating simulated features and the upcoming "Magic Editor" functionality.
keywords: Google Pixel 8, advertisement, street, features, magic editor

text: Features simulated and sequences shortened throughout ad.
description: A user interacts with a photo on a Google Pixel phone, showcasing the "Magic Editor" as the photo of the man jumping is touched with a finger to seemingly edit it. The fine print mentions features are simulated.
keywords: Google Pixel 8, magic editor, photo editing, simulated features, interacting

description: A light blue Google Pixel phone, mounted on a tripod, records a man against a scenic backdrop of rocky cliffs and ocean, highlighting the phone's video recording capabilities.
keywords: Google Pixel 8, video recording, tripod, scenic, rocky cliff

description: Continuing the previous proposal scene, the text "make it clear" appears as a man proposes to a woman with the sea as the backdrop, referring to the camera quality.
keywords: Google Pixel 8, advertisement, proposal, ocean, camera quality

description: A Google Pixel phone's AI "Audio Magic Eraser" feature analyzes a video, identifying sounds, specifically "Wind" and "Speech", showcasing its audio processing capabilities.
keywords: Google Pixel 8, audio magic eraser, identifying sounds, wind, speech

description: The hands-on use of "Audio Magic Eraser," with the user adjusting the volume of the "Wind" to -28, illustrating the granular audio control offered by the Google Pixel phone.
keywords: Google Pixel 8, audio magic eraser, wind reduction, volume control, AI

text: Editing features may not work on all images or audio/image elements.
description: Following the audio editing demonstration, viewers see the couple again on the cliff. The woman reacts with joy to the proposal, having been captured with clear audio thanks to the Pixel 8.
keywords: Google Pixel 8, proposal, ocean, AI enhancements, joyous reaction

text: Editing features may not work on all images or audio/image elements.
description: A group of five young adults pose for a selfie in a wildflower field using the AI-powered camera. They were just mentioned in the statement before.
keywords: Google Pixel 8, selfie, group, wildflowers, AI Camera

text: Editing features may not work on all images or audio/image elements.
Bditing features may not work on all images or audio/image elements.
description: The group selfie in the wildflower field continues, with the prompt "make everyone" suggesting optimizing the photo for all subjects present.
keywords: Google Pixel 8, group selfie, optimization, wildflower, portrait

description: Another shot of the group selfie with AI enhancements, taken in a wildflower field to highlight the camera capabilities of the current Google Pixel device.
keywords: Google Pixel 8, group selfie, AI enhancements, wildflower field, camera

transcript: The only AI phone engineered by Google Google Pixel 8
text: The only phone engineered by Google
description: The video shows a group of four young people looking down at the camera. The camera is positioned low, looking up at them against a bright sky. The Google Pixel logo is in the top left corner. The people are diverse in ethnicity and style, wearing casual clothing. There are some flowers in the foreground. The word "Yep" appears in white text over the image.
keywords: group, young people, Google Pixel, sky, flowers

transcript: The only AI phone engineered by Google Google Pixel 8
text: The only phone engineered by Google
description: The video is a Google Pixel 8 advertisement. It begins with the words "That's the" in black text, followed by "AI" in a purple and blue gradient. Next, the words "only in" appear in black text. The video then shows a light blue Google Pixel 8 phone with the words "Google Pixel 8" in black text. The video ends with the words "The only phone engineered by Google" in black text.
keywords: Google Pixel 8, AI, phone, advertisement, technology

description: The advertisement ends with a call to action, urging viewers to "Check out exciting offers" at authorized retailer Flipkart as the Google logo is presented once again with brand reinforcement.
keywords: Google Pixel 8, offers, authorized retailer, flipkart, call-to-action
